zh.title: 比特币/美元技术分析：[当前走势趋于震荡整理]
zh.content:
目前比特币/美元（BTC/USD）价格为87346.95，24小时内小幅上涨0.67%。从高点87594.23和低点86750.87来看，市场正在经历一定的震荡整理。短期内，价格未能有效突破前高，显示出买方动力不足，可能会在这一区间内徘徊。

技术指标方面，虽然RSI未提供，但MACD值为-51.10264，表明当前市场处于弱势。SMA(20)为86217.16，显示出价格在该均线附近震荡，支撑位可能在此附近形成。若价格持续在此均线之上运行，或可迎来短期反弹机会。

支撑位初步设定在86750.87，若下破则可能进一步测试85500附近的支撑；而阻力位则在87594.23，若突破此水平，可能引发买盘加速，推动价格进一步上涨。整体来看，市场情绪谨慎，短期内或以区间震荡为主。

建议投资者在关键支撑位附近寻找买入机会，待反弹至阻力位时考虑部分获利了结。同时，需关注市场情绪变化和技术指标的进一步信号，以便及时调整策略。

en.title: Bitcoin vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The current price of Bitcoin against the US Dollar stands at 87,346.95, reflecting a modest 24-hour gain of 0.67%. This indicates a stable short-term trend, albeit within a broader range that has established itself between the recent high of 87,594.23 and the low of 86,750.87. Traders should closely monitor this range, as a breakout above the high could signal a bullish continuation, while a drop below the low might indicate a bearish reversal.

In terms of technical indicators, the current MACD value of -51.10 suggests bearish momentum, although the absence of a signal line complicates the analysis. The SMA (20) at 86,217.16 offers a potential support level, which, if maintained, could act as a foundation for further upward movement. Conversely, a breakdown below this moving average could trigger increased selling pressure, further confirming bearish sentiment.

Support levels are primarily located at the SMA (20) and the recent low of 86,750.87. If these levels fail to hold, traders may look to the next support at approximately 85,000, a psychological barrier. Resistance is evident at the recent high of 87,594.23, and a breakout here could lead to a test of higher levels, possibly approaching the 90,000 mark if bullish momentum picks up.

For trading strategies, a cautious approach is advisable. Traders may consider buying near the SMA (20) for a potential bounce, while setting stop-loss orders just below 86,750.87 to mitigate risk. Alternatively, a breakout above 87,594.23 could provide an opportunity for a short-term buy, with profit targets set at psychological levels like 90,000. Overall, maintaining a watchful eye on market sentiment and key technical levels will be crucial for informed trading decisions.
